DOC.brief_summary: Post partum Hemorrhage ( PPH ) one three main cause death pregnant woman . Oxytocin widely use prevention PPH . Some study suggest misoprostol alternative treatment Oxytocin n't available . The aim study compare safety efficacy Oxytocin misoprostol prevention PPH .
DOC.brief_title: Misoprostol Versus Oxytocin Prevention Post Partum Hemorrhage
DOC.detailed_description: In double blind randomize control trial 400 pregnant woman vaginal delivery Shariati hospital assign two group either receive 20 unite oxytocin 1000cc ringer 2 placebo tablet 400mcg oral misoprostol 2cc normal saline 1000cc ringer .
